briefTitle: A Safety and Efficacy Comparison of BLI4700 Bowel Preparation Versus an FDA-approved Comparator in Adult Subjects Prior to Colonoscopy
officialTitle: A Safety and Efficacy Comparison of BLI4700 Bowel Preparation Versus an FDA-approved Comparator in Adult Subjects Prior to Colonoscopy
summary: The objective of this study is to compare the safety and efficacy of BLI4700 bowel preparation to an FDA-approved bowel preparation as 2-day, split-dose bowel preparations prior to colonoscopy in adult patients.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number and Percentage of Subjects With Successful Bowel Cleansing
